BotScripts.IntroPrompt: It's hotty. Mummy and I liked to play a game. Now you and I will play it, to help us understand each other. I say a word, then you say the first word that comes into your head. Got it?
BotScripts.Prompt: What do you come when I say {0}
BotScripts.OutroMessage: Jesus mate. It's just a game, but the way you think is {messed up|crazy|fucked|stupid|insane|delusional|screwed|disturbing} and I'm hanging up
